title: Slice of Hell Cake
summaries: The Slice of Hell Cake is a pet summon item which summons a Baby Imp pet that follows the player around. When the player is far enough away, the Baby Imp will spread its arms and fly to catch up to the player. The Slice of Hell Cake has a 10*1/10 (10%) chance of being found in Shadow Chests and a 5*1/20 (5%) chance of being found in Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.
